short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take Bitcoin's pulse. Get the block height, sats per dollar, dollars per bitcoin, and more interesting stats

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: At the push of a button, this extension fetches data from Blockstream and Coingecko. It lets you look at block data on mempool.space. Last but not least, it gives you a snapshot of the Bitcoin Network with Clark Moody's Dashboard.
